properties.vacuous-pass: After calling set() with a value different from 1, the assertion assert(false) is reached and a violation is found
properties.vacuous-pass-vacuity-check: After calling set() with a value different from 1, the assertion assert(false) is reached and a violation is found
properties.correct-violation: After calling set() with a value of 1, the assertion assert(false) is reached and a violation is found
properties.correct-pass: After calling set() with a value of 1, the assertion assert(true) is reached and no violation is found
